name: 陳文輝
objective: This course provides students with hands-on projects and reading assignments to learn advanced neural networks. We will cover the trending research and main architectures for deep learning, including convolutional neural networks, recurrent neural networks, and generative adversarial networks, etc.
schedule:
Week1~Week3: Machine Learning Basics
Week4~Week5: Deep Feedforward Networks
Week6~ Week8: Convolutional Networks
Week9: Midterm
Week10~Week12: Sequence Modeling Networks
Week13~Week15: Practical Applications
Week16~Week17: Term Project Presentation
Week18: Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
Assignment & Participation: 25%
Midterm: 25%
Term Project: 25%
Final Exam: 25%
materials:
1. Deep Learning, Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, Aaron Courville
2. Selected Readings
